PERSONA.NAME: Duke of Milan
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Father to Silvia, banishes Valentine in hopes Silvia will marry Thurio.

PERSONA.NAME: Valentine
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentleman of Verona, woos Silvia and is banished by the Duke.

PERSONA.NAME: Proteus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentleman of Verona, Antonio's son. First in love with Julia then later Silvia.

PERSONA.NAME: Thurio
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Foolish rival to Valentine for Silvia's hand.

PERSONA.NAME: Eglamour
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An accomplice for Silvia in her escape

PERSONA.NAME: First Outlaw
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Led by Valentine during his banishment

PERSONA.NAME: Second Outlaw
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Led by Valentine during his banishment

PERSONA.NAME: Third Outlaw
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Led by Valentine during his banishment

PERSONA.NAME: Speed
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Servant to Valentine, very witty, but often late.

PERSONA.NAME: Launce
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Clownish servant to Proteus, joined by his dog Crab.

PERSONA.NAME: Julia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Beloved of Proteus, disguises herself as Sebastian.

PERSONA.NAME: Silvia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Daughter to the Duke of Milan, beloved of Valentine

PERSONA.NAME: Lucetta
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Waiting woman to Julia and seamstress.
